channel.title: Wont let me Drop items
channel.description: 667 Server, wont let me drop items. how do i fix this? Thanks.. :palm:

item.title: Wont let me Drop items
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“Artorias, post:6, topic:546393”][quote author=tyb97 link=topic=665291.msg4447515#msg4447515 date=1409618966]
Please post a better question, “won’t let me drop items” isn’t very good and won’t help us help you. Try giving us some more details and code, and information pertaining to things such as: Does it drop items on death? Can we see the code that handles the dropping of items from the inventory, or packet 87? Anything more specific than this would help tremendously.
[/quote]

don’t think that would help since 317 and 667 have different protocol[/quote]
This is true, however it’s still the right concept.

[quote=“Fr33dom99, post:5, topic:546393”][quote author=Limits link=topic=665291.msg4447538#msg4447538 date=1409628716]
WE GET IT. YOU CAN’T DROP ITEMS. HOW CAN WE HELP YOU IF YOU DONT SHOW US CODE
[/quote]
I dont know what i need to show you!!.. Idk what file or whst method where…

I got told to do… InventoryOptionssomething.java[/quote]
Dat hardcoding. Find the class that handles the right click > drop action packet. If you don’t understand this statement you should probably study a bit more on what is going on. You seem to assume that all rs emulators coming working, like any other game server would, however these don’t work the same, you actually have to know a thing or two about OO Programming.

Read full topic

item.title: Wont let me Drop items
item.dc:creator: @Fr33dom99 Fr33dom99
item.description:
@Fr33dom99 wrote:

Say i have coins in my inventory i right click and try to drop them to the floor, it wont let me? Thats what im asking, how do i make it so when i try to drop an item, it goes to the floor?>?

Read full topic
